property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Spread within its containing object.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the Spread.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the Spread.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Spread.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Spread (a Document).

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container (such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: flattenerOverride
property.shortdesc: The transparency flattener preferences override for the spread.

property.name: allowPageShuffle
property.shortdesc: If true, guarantees that when pages are added to a spread it will contain a maximum of two pages. If false, allows pages to be added or moved into existing spreads. For override information, see preserve layout when shuffling.

property.name: showMasterItems
property.shortdesc: If true, displays master page items on document pages in the spread.

property.name: appliedMaster
property.shortdesc: The master spread applied to the Spread. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: idmlComponentName
property.shortdesc: The IDML component name of the Spread.

property.name: pageTransitionDirection
property.shortdesc: The direction of the page transition.

property.name: pageTransitionDuration
property.shortdesc: The duration of the page transition.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the Spread; this is an alias to the Spread's label property.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: placeXML
method.shortdesc: Places the XML element onto a page. If the place point is above an existing page item, place the XML element into the page item.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The XML element to place.

parameters.name: placePoint
parameters.shortdesc: The point at which to place the object, specified in the format [x, y].

parameters.name: autoflowing
parameters.shortdesc: If true, autoflows placed text. (Optional)

method.name: setContent
method.shortdesc: Replaces the content of XML element with content imported from a file.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The file path to the import file.

parameters.name: relativeBasePath
parameters.shortdesc: Base path used to resolve relative paths. (Optional)

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the spread.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the spread relative to the reference object or within the document.  (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: Spread, Page or Document. (Optional)

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the Spread.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the spread.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the spread relative to the reference object or within the document. (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required only when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: Spread, Document or MasterSpread. (Optional)

method.name: placeAndLink
method.shortdesc: Deprecated: Use contentPlace method. Original Description: Create a linked story and place it into the target.

parameters.name: parentStory
parameters.shortdesc: The story to place and link from.

parameters.name: placePoint
parameters.shortdesc: The point at which to place (Optional)

parameters.name: destinationLayer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to place (Optional)

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog (Optional)

method.name: place
method.shortdesc: Places the file.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.shortdesc: The file to place

parameters.name: placePoint
parameters.shortdesc: The point at which to place (Optional)

parameters.name: destinationLayer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to place (Optional)

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the import options dialog (Optional)

parameters.name: autoflowing
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to autoflow placed text (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the placed object(s) (Optional)

method.name: removeOverride
method.shortdesc: Removes the override from a previously overridden master page item.

method.name: detach
method.shortdesc: Detaches an overridden master page item from the master page.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.shortdesc: The selection status of the Spread in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

method.name: createGuides
method.shortdesc: Creates multiple guides on all pages of the spread.

parameters.name: numberOfRows
parameters.shortdesc: The number of rows to create on each page. (Optional)

parameters.name: numberOfColumns
parameters.shortdesc: The number of columns to create on each page.  (Optional)

parameters.name: rowGutter
parameters.shortdesc: The height of the gutter between rows. (Optional)

parameters.name: columnGutter
parameters.shortdesc: The width of the gutter between columns. (Optional)

parameters.name: guideColor
parameters.shortdesc: The color to make the guides, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can accept: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator. (Optional)

parameters.name: fitMargins
parameters.shortdesc: If true, the row height and column width are calculated based on the space within the page margins. If false, row height and column width are calculated based on the full page. (Optional)

parameters.name: removeExisting
parameters.shortdesc: If true, removes existing guides when creating new ones. (Optional)

parameters.name: layer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to create the guides. (Optional)

method.name: transform
method.shortdesc: Transform the page item.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The temporary origin during the transformation. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: withMatrix
parameters.shortdesc: Transform matrix. Can accept: Array of 6 Reals or TransformationMatrix.

parameters.name: replacingCurrent
parameters.shortdesc: Transform components to consider; providing this optional parameter causes the target's existing transform components to be replaced with new values.  Without this parameter, the given matrix is concatenated onto the target's existing transform combining the effect of the two. Can accept: MatrixContent enumerator, Array of MatrixContent enumerators or Long Integer. (Optional)

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.shortdesc: If true then a ruler based origin is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

method.name: transformValuesOf
method.shortdesc: Get the transformation values of the page item.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

method.name: resolve
method.shortdesc: Get the coordinates of the given location in the specified coordinate system.

parameters.name: location
parameters.shortdesc: The location requested. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameters.name: in
parameters.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use.

parameters.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameters.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. (Optional)

method.name: contentPlace
method.shortdesc: Duplicate an object and place it into the target.

parameters.name: pageItems
parameters.shortdesc: One or more page items to place or load

parameters.name: linkPageItems
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to link pageItems in content placer (if true it will override link stories value) (Optional)

parameters.name: linkStories
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to link stories in content placer (only applicable for single story, pageItem links will also be created in case of more than one item) (Optional)

parameters.name: mapStyles
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to map styles in content placer (Optional)

parameters.name: placePoint
parameters.shortdesc: The point at which to place (Optional)

parameters.name: destinationLayer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to place (Optional)

parameters.name: showingOptions
parameters.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog (Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Spread.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)
